html:
3.7.18  12:53 am   How did you figure out that successful art is hypnosis?

     in an infinite world, if you're gonna focus on just 1 thing you better have a pretty good story

     I didn't want to believe it. Then I thought it over and yup. It is.

3.7.18  12:33 am   What's the reason with adding lacoste at the end of "Time Mop"?

     to add a sense of mystery, and intrigue. i can prove it's a mystery by citing the fact that you asked me what the heck it's for

3.7.18  12:03 am   Is http://www.billwurtz.com/email.html the biggest page on your website?

     no, it might actually be the smallest

3.6.18  11:59 pm   Why is the background of the lyrics page red? It may cause blindness

      that's a gentle reminder that the lyrics belong in the songs, not sitting silently on a page

3.6.18  11:52 pm   What is one new thing you learned today?

     i've been learning something very gradually, over the course of several days

3.6.18  11:43 pm   Can you give an in-depth analysis on the song "Hot Cross Buns"?

     alluring, provocative, steps right up to the line but does not cross it. leaves us all wondering, just who's buns they are

3.6.18  11:42 pm   a lot of people ask why you dont post in the notebook is there something wrong with it

     no

      or is there another way we're supposed to gain access to it

     go to billwurtz dot com, click 'notebook' then you will see a list of dates. that's the original date each item was written. you should see hundreds of them, and i am constantly adding more. i'm adding the weirder and weirder ones, as i gain more courage

3.6.18  11:36 pm   What is your opinion on your haters?

     they hate me? just guessing

3.6.18  11:16 pm   What don't you want to do?

     erase the universe

3.6.18  10:53 pm   Do you ever think to make collab music?

     not anymore

3.6.18  10:45 pm   Why is it that I feel that all of your videos have a hidden meaning behind every sentence?

     if it was hidden then you probably wouldn't feel it

3.6.18  10:18 pm   What's the reasoning for putting out all of this content? I think it's awesome but curious for a motive.

     are you telling me you don't know why i would want to do something awesome

3.6.18  9:40 pm   what if yes?

     then that's the way it is

3.6.18  9:05 pm   You ever used the lick

     yes

3.6.18  8:39 pm   Why don't you post notes in the notebook anymore?

     why don't you ever notice when i do

     It has been almost 1 year since you last posted one

     that's not true, i posted like 15 of them last week

3.6.18  8:32 pm   Is the "no" song your shortest song?

     i think sheep is probably shorter than that

3.6.18  8:27 pm   3.4.18  2:43 am says you use the tambourine. 3.4.18  1:59 pm 's answer says "absolutely not". Does this mean YOU have a second tambourine?

     yes, it's right next to my typewriter, my record player, and my T.V.

3.6.18  8:04 pm   when talking about your drums, you said "they are actually stacked in cases, right off screen. quiet, and not disturbing the neighbors at 3am when i shoot these music videos "

do you still record any of your videos at 3 am?

     any time between evening and dawn. it needs to be night time, to get the right lighting. in the summer there are much fewer hours to work with

3.6.18  7:35 pm   what is the weather?

     it's like atmospharic conditions

3.6.18  6:53 pm   Is donald trump's presidency an artistic statement?

     i think it's more of a statement of ambition

3.6.18  5:24 pm   what is an example of an opinion you have?

     it's tuesday

3.6.18  4:18 pm   hey bill. whats the inspiration for the song "what if spain was in greece".

     oh shit need today's vine better think of something

      Just wondering: What's the creative process behind this song? Thank you

     the jingle came to me vividly, except without the location names. i knew they had to be locations and they had to be one syllable. the only ones i could think of were "what if rome was in maine" but that's not nearly good enough, it needs to be way more punchy. i realized there's not actually that many one syllable locations so i went online to find a list of 1 syllable place names. almost nothing seemed right, but 'spain, greece' was a perfect fit

3.6.18  3:58 pm   What's your new song about?

      adventure, escape, exuberance, progression, and courage

3.6.18  3:52 pm   i went to the store today and bought one more bag of rice than what was necessary. would you like the bag of rice?

     no

3.6.18  3:51 pm   do you want to do everything?

     almost

3.6.18  2:02 pm   crunchy or creamy?

     is what crunchy or creamy

      elaborate

     you didn't tell me what thing i'm supposed to evaluate the crunchiness or creaminess of

3.6.18  1:55 pm   Do I look retarded?

     i can't see you from here

3.6.18  1:30 pm   Is my car fast? 

     which car is it

3.6.18  12:19 pm   are you clinically depressed?

     no

      if so, same

3.6.18  12:09 pm   How can you not like practice?

     you might be taking me out of context, but that's ok

      It seems like a critical step between not playing the song and playing the song.

     how do you practice playing a song without actually playing it

      Also practicing the fundamentals (scales, right and left hand patterns, etc.) seems like a great way to learn future songs more easily and in less time.

     what i think is even better for practice for future songs is songs

3.6.18  12:04 pm   7.16.16  9:37 pm    the chart has the lyrics "even if you try to understand you can't because your hands are in your pants". why did you change the lyrics

     because i didn't like it

      and what did the original line with the hands in pants mean?

     hands, in the pants

3.6.18  11:52 am   what should i do if i spill mustard on my dress?

     sell it for a trillion dollars

3.6.18  10:24 am   Will you ever do more in reality/notebook?

     of course

3.6.18  9:42 am   whats the purpose of being outside?

     throw boomerangs, the very long range ones

3.6.18  9:35 am   Do you know how to drive a car that has stick shift?

     that's the only way i know how to drive

3.6.18  9:02 am   doing creative stuff sometimes feels like solving a puzzle, only there are no pieces and you have to make up every piece of the puzzle. also the completed puzzle doesn't quite look like it said on the box, and you can't get a refund but it's still pretty damn cool i guess

     that's true

3.6.18  8:55 am   Which came first in your training: Music or animations?

     music

3.6.18  8:52 am   Do you fear of turning into mud?

     no

3.6.18  6:50 am   when will you make a new song

     now

3.6.18  4:00 am   You will be in the Eurovision Song Contest, competing for Auberginia!

     that's not true

      Please write a 3 min song with seven other people!

     so often, one of the things that makes songs ::great:: is their "losing" qualities. for this reason i will not be participating in a songwriting contest. the entire world i live in is already a contest

3.6.18  3:35 am   when this question page start?

     3.31.16 but before that it was on a different page

3.6.18  3:31 am   do you ever make your music or video with somoene else?

     no

3.6.18  3:27 am   how can any of us prove that we are real

     compare yourself to other real things who's realness has been verified

3.6.18  3:06 am   Would you say that Dril on Twitter is the trailer park Bill Wurtz

     dril does not live in a trailer park, his house is quite decent, he wears tuxedos often and is a respected member of the gamer's community, not to mention a modern day connoiseur of diapers and Freedom. and it's about time he received the blue check mark, athough i don't think that's going to happen because his picture is jack nicholson and he is not jack nicholson and the blue check mark would unfortunately imply that he is jack nicholson which is why i don't think he is going to get it

3.6.18  1:03 am   if you could perfectly express one specific emotion in a bit of music, what emotion would it be 

     music can already express way more than 1 emotion

3.5.18  11:18 pm   3.5.18  4:20 pm Hey im the girl who did the nihilist question, i did some research on google dot com and found that nihilism is when you believe that life (or at least certain aspects of it) is meaningless, and also that you reject laws/society aand stuff. Does this sound like you?

     no

3.5.18  11:08 pm   why people talking bout facts and shit. facts dont exist

     is that true

3.5.18  11:00 pm   Aerospace Engineering or Applied Physics?

     for what

3.5.18  10:57 pm   are you the homeless trumpeteer guy who i see every week day 

     no

3.5.18  10:55 pm   why is the ask button so ominous

     i just made it a normal button, regular style. perhaps you are in an ominous state of mind
